fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The Brexit party candidate Debbie Soloman, not “Solomon”, is due to stand in the constituency of Bassetlaw, not “Bassett Law”, as we had it (Farage swipes at rivals after bruising start, 6 November, page 9). • A rugby union article referred to “the 2021 [British and Irish] Lions tour to New Zealand”. That tour will be to South Africa (Don’t go back into the doldrums, urges coach, 2 November, page 12, Sport). • Other recently corrected articles include: When do the clocks change around the world? And why? Voters overwhelmingly tell Kansas City to drop Martin Luther King street name
